about_the_game:
DOOMBOX is a bullet-heaven roguelike RPG with twin-stick action, dynamic skill synergy and elemental interactions, all wrapped up in a beautifully animated 2.5D Pixel art world. 

Play as Kreek Swamptoes, and defend your swamp from the legions of bug mutants that want your sludge. That's your sludge, not theirs.

Stand up for yourself and kill a LOT of lil creatures that may or may not be cuter than you, but they sure do bleed more.

Accompanying you are is the mysterious ADAM and his DOOMBOX, the source of your power. Why does he help you? Surely there is a narrative explanation?! Perhaps there will be but for now HE JUST DOES.

Grind to craft a fun array of peculiar armaments and hunt down all the hats.

What the heck is a DOOMBOX anyway?

short_description: DOOMBOX is a survival bullet-heaven roguelike where a bazillion creatures emerge from somewhere. Craft a bunch of nifty guns, wear silly hats, and kill the crap out those creatures with over-the-top builds all fueled by the power of your DOOMBOX
